DOC.brief_summary: This study involve 20 bilateral patient per surgeon . Patients assess pre-operatively , subsequent visit ( follow implantation intraocular lens second eye ) 1 week , 1 month , 3 month 6 month post-operatively .
DOC.brief_title: Visual Function After Implantation Bilateral AcrySoft ReSTOR Aspheric IOL
DOC.criteria: 21 year old ; need spherical correction 1030 Diopters ( D ) ; corneal astigmatism le 0.75D measured keratometry ; willing sign Informed Consent Form complete visit ; pupil dilation great 6mm ; expect Visual Acuity ( measure logMAR ) =0.3 good Women childbearing potential ; irregular corneal astigmatism ; keratopathy/keratectasia ; cornea inflammation edema ; cornea reshape surgery ; corneal dystrophy ; corneal transplant ; amblyopia ; glaucoma ; Retinal Pigment Epitheliopathy ( RPE ) /Macular change ; proliferative diabetic retinopathy
